item.description:
June's meeting will be a fun one. Our own Bob Adelizzi will be once again our main speaker.

Bob's topic will be based on VFR flight into IFR conditions. What the controllers can do to help. How ATC gets involved to get you out.

 

Bring your questions on this topic. T-Storms will be popping up soon enough. Don't get caught in IMC and add the worry about getting out of it.

 

 

 

Although this meeting is for FPA members, please invite all your pilot friends and RSVP accordingly. More details will follow on this meeting soon.

 

 

 

 

There will be some good door prizes as well. Join us for some fun learning and comraderie.

 

 

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
